name: Encyclopaedia of Islam
description: Includes all material from EI2 (1955-2005) and EI3 (2007-), AND all maps from Historical Atlas of Islam. ** Encyclopaedia of Islam THREE (2007- ) is an entirely new work, with new articles reflecting the great diversity of current scholarship. It will appear in four substantial segments each year, both online and in print. The new scope includes comprehensive coverage of Islam in the twentieth century and of Muslim minorities all over the world. **
